article_title: From Bioterrorism To Zika, Readiness Lags For U.S. Health Emergencies

article_metadata.description: The U.S. scores 6.7 out of 10 on health emergency preparedness with wide differences in states ability to respond to and recover from large-scale emergencies, according to a health emergency preparedness index from the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
